name: 12 Hours in KLM's Best Seat!
description:
12 Hours in KLM's Best Seat?  Yes Please!

Join me as I experience business class on the KLM 787 from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport all the way to Singapore.  It is travel in the lap of luxury on the world's best designed airline KLM, Royal Dutch Airlines.  

This is KLM's Best Seat. 

This KLM Business Class Flight Review covers the entire KLM business class experience from dedicated Sky Priority Check-in at Amsterdam Schiphol through to the KLM Crown Business Class Lounge and then the wonderful onboard service by the friendly and efficient KLM cabin crew. 

This was an evening flight so I got to experience both dinner and breakfast which were served on the most beautiful crockery in the sky. 

Join me and let's fly together on KLM's Best Seat. 

#KLM #KLMBusinessClass #AirlineDesign
